page.title: 07BUILDING
page.content: In our area a lot of building is going on.More and more farmland being turned over so people can have houses. Because there is quite a bit of countryside here,close to the villages, it makes an ideal place for building.Most of the building is going on in Narborough and Enderby although there is some in Whetstone. The builders work from 9am to 5pm. Their work is very noisy.Most of the houses are made from brick,mortar and wood.In some,the structure is wood and they build brick around. Apart from the houses, they are building roads.First they put some gravel for foundations,rolling it down firmly.When that is done, they pour in the tarmac and smooth it down. In a year or so the area will be unrecognisable.
